welcome.title: Welcome to Mercado LP
welcome.description: Think of an automatic stand: there‚Äôs always a price and no intermediaries. Here you see it with fruit‚Äîsimple and not intimidating.
welcome.tip: In a CEX you buy from a market maker, not your friend. Here you see open prices without middlemen.

inventory.title: Your fruit (tokens)
inventory.description: You have pesos as base money and fruit as tokens. You‚Äôll swap between them and see how prices move.
inventory.tip: Each fruit is available liquidity. If you buy too much of one, the basket empties and price goes up.

pools.title: Automatic stands (pools)
pools.description: Each pool has two fruits. The price changes based on how much there is of each. If one gets scarce, price rises.
pools.tip: The pool replaces the order book: the AMM formula always gives you a price even if no buyer is in front.

swap.title: Do your first swap
swap.description: Pick a fruit, set an amount, and see what you get. You‚Äôll notice price impact if the order is big.
swap.action: Try with a small amount to see the change.
swap.tip: If you buy a lot at once, you empty the basket and price climbs. Start small to see real impact.

fees.title: Fees (tips)
fees.description: Every swap pays a small fee to whoever supplied fruit to the pool.
fees.tip: The tip incentivizes someone to keep the stand stocked. Without it, nobody would leave fruit there.

mission.title: Your first mission
mission.description: Complete your first swap. Trade some pesos for fruit and earn XP.
mission.action: Make a swap from pesos to any fruit.
mission.tip: A swap shows price, fee, and change live. Here you practice risk-free and earn XP.

modal.title: How to plant a crop?
modal.body1: As a farmer you create fruits (tokens) and open a garden (pool) so others can buy them.
list: Give your fruit a name and symbol

modal.note: The initial ratio defines price. If you add 100 GOLD and 50 PESO, then 1 GOLD = 0.5 PESO.
